scripts.say: There's a lot of them, but they're merely production-type models.
We haven't even seen a single humanoid-type Siren, let alone an elite...
Instead, it's just been crude copies of us...
Even if they look like us, they are just lifeless husks in comparison...
It's sickening to see so many of them...
If you're going to clone, at least give them some cute clothes and makeup!
I bet it's much easier to get those Sirens to surrender than it is to teach them to develop some taste!
That's just the way things are. When Commander gives the order, I'll need you to follow me.
Victorious's strange obsession aside, it's always disconcerting to have to aim your weapons at your image repeatedly.
The other fleets have been proceeding as planned. Let's not waste time here.
